heroSection.title: ChatBet is the #1 AI-powered betting assistant

heroSection.description: ChatBet is the #1 AI-powered betting assistant-transforming messaging apps into powerful revenue channels for operators.
heroSection.secondDescription: Players can bet instantly via WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, and more. No apps, no friction — just seamless chat-based betting.
heroSection.thirdDescription: Built for operators, enjoyed by players.

whatIsChatBet.title: What is ChatBet?
whatIsChatBet.description: ChatBet is the first AI-powered betting assistant, offering operators fully automated, real-time betting via chat - and unlocking a brand-new revenue channel through messaging platforms.

features.title: Increase Engagement:
features.description: Players place bets as naturally as chatting with a friend.

features.title: Boost Retention:
features.description: AI-driven personalization keeps players coming back.

features.title: Maximize Revenue:
features.description: Operators report a +30% increase in retention & betting frequency.

features.title: Frictionless Betting:
features.description: No apps, no websites—just chat & play.

whatIsChatBet.footerText: ChatBet turns WhatsApp, Telegram, and other messaging apps into high-performing betting channels, helping operators grow without adding complexity.
whatIsChatBet.disclaimer: Available exclusively through licensed sportsbook operators for a fully compliant, secure integration.

security.title: Top-Level Protection For Operators & Players
security.description: ChatBet is built on enterprise-grade infrastructure, ensuring maximum player and operator protection.

items.title: End-to-End Encryption:
items.description: 100% secure transactions & player data protection.

items.title: PCI DSS & ISO 27001 Certified:
items.description: Meets global financial security standards.

items.title: AWS & OpenAI Infrastructure:
items.description: Industry-leading cloud security & scalability.

items.title: Fraud Detection & Risk Management:
items.description: AI-driven safeguards against unauthorized access.

compliance.title: Regulatory-Compliant AI Betting
compliance.description: ChatBet is designed to operate exclusively through licensed sportsbook operators, ensuring full legal & regulatory compliance.
compliance.secondDescription: While ChatBet introduces a new way to monetize—through messaging apps—it functions purely as a communication channel.

items.title: No Direct Fund Handling:
items.description: All transactions go through the operator’s wallet.

items.title: No Player Data Storage:
items.description: ChatBet relays information but does not retain user data.

items.title: Operator-Controlled Markets:
items.description: ChatBet mirrors the sportsbook’s existing offerings.

items.title: Adheres to Global Regulations:
items.description: Compliance with iGaming, GDPR, and financial laws.

compliance.footer: ChatBet is not a new platform—it’s a smarter interface layered on top of the operator’s system, simplifying betting while maintaining full regulatory alignment.

changingGame.title: How ChatBet is Changing the Game

paragraph1.part1: ChatBet was born from a bold vision: to make betting as easy as chatting with a friend.
paragraph1.highlight1: to make betting as easy as chatting with a friend.
paragraph1.part2: In a world where users interact through messaging more than ever, we saw an opportunity to eliminate friction in betting. No apps, no websites—just simple, AI-powered betting via chat.

paragraph2.part1: From a startup idea to becoming a trusted partner of industry leaders like AWS, OpenAI, and Meta,
paragraph2.highlight1: trusted partner of industry leaders like AWS, OpenAI, and Meta,
paragraph2.part2: ChatBet is revolutionizing the way players and operators experience betting.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To make betting seamless, personalized, and engaging by leveraging AI and natural language processing—creating a frictionless experience for both players and operators.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To lead the global shift towards chat-based gaming, making traditional betting platforms obsolete by offering a faster, smarter, and more intuitive way to bet.

team.title: The Team

members.name: Jean Varon
members.description: Focused on customer success, ensuring seamless operator integrations, retention, and long-term client satisfaction.

spotlight.title: SPOTLIGHT
spotlight.subtitle: Breaking News & Milestones
spotlight.description: Stay up to date with ChatBet's latest achievements, industry recognitions, and global expansion. From exclusive event invitations to game-changing partnerships, this is where we showcase our journey as we redefine the future of betting.

notices.title: ChatBet Shortlisted as Rising Star in Sports Betting at SBC Awards Europe 2025
content: ChatBet has been shortlisted for the Rising Star in Sports Betting award at SBC Awards Europe 2025!
This nomination recognizes our disruptive approach to betting—bringing AI-powered, conversational experiences directly into WhatsApp and Telegram.
We're honored to stand among Europe’s top innovators in gaming.

notices.title: ChatBet Will Be at GAT Expo Gaming & Technology 2025!
content: From April 28 to 30, you will find us in Cartagena, Colombia, participating in one of the most important gaming and technology events in Latin America.

GAT Expo is the meeting point for innovation leaders in iGaming, and ChatBet wouldn't miss it. We will be showcasing how we are transforming the betting experience through artificial intelligence and conversational betting, directly via WhatsApp and Telegram.
If you're planning to attend, we would love for you to stop by, get to know our project, and have a chat about how we are building the future of betting.

notices.title: ChatBet at BIS Sigma Brazil – All In on LATAM
content: We’re excited to be on the ground at BIS Sigma Brazil, happening April 7–10, 2025 in São Paulo. While we won’t have a booth, our sales and growth team will be actively networking, scheduling demos, and showcasing the latest updates that are transforming the chat betting industry.
This marks a strategic step in our commitment to Brazil and the broader LATAM market. If you're attending, make sure to connect with us — let's build the future of betting together.

notices.title: ChatBet Takes the Stage at ICE 2025 in Barcelona!
content: We're thrilled to announce that ChatBet has been officially invited to ICE 2025 in Barcelona, one of the most prestigious events in the gaming industry! Not only will we have a presence at the event, but we've also been selected to participate in the Startup Pitch, where the most innovative companies in gaming showcase their technology to investors and industry leaders.
Stay tuned for more updates as we prepare to showcase how ChatBet is revolutionizing AI-powered betting!

notices.title: ChatBet Named Finalist in the ICE 2025 Startup Pitch!
content: The excitement continues—ChatBet officially made it to the finals of the ICE 2025 Startup Pitch in Barcelona! Out of countless applicants, our AI-powered betting solution stood out as one of the most disruptive innovations in the gaming industry.

This recognition reinforces our vision: chat-based betting is the future. We are honored to pitch in front of top investors, operators, and industry experts who recognize the impact of our technology.

section1.title: What makes ChatBet hard to replicate?
section1.content: According to ChatGPT—it's extremely difficult, for several structural reasons: At surface level, ChatBet may seem like a chatbot. In reality, it’s a robust, intelligent betting platform built specifically for conversational ecosystems. That's why replication is extremely difficult.

section1_5.title: What problem is ChatBet solving?
section1_5.content1: Web-based betting is outdated. Users are shifting to messaging platforms and conversational interfaces.
section1_5.content2: ChatBet brings betting where users already spend their time—and how they want to interact.
section1_5.list2: People spend 3x more time in chat apps than on the web (Data.ai, 2023)
section1_5.list3: 48% of users now prefer to interact with AI assistants (Gartner, 2024)
section1_5.list4: 70% of Gen Z prefers chat or voice over websites or apps (Deloitte, 2024)
section1_5.content3: AI-driven bots are rapidly gaining traction—demonstrating global appetite for conversational AI.

section2.title: What’s the total addressable market (TAM)?
section2.content: The global iGaming market is projected to surpass $90B by 2026. Messaging-based betting is still a blue ocean, especially in emerging markets (LatAm, Africa, Asia).

section3.title: How is ChatBet performing so far?

section4.title: Who’s behind ChatBet?
section4.content: We’re a globally distributed team, ready to support operators 24/7 in any timezone. Our edge lies in our structure:
section4.list1: Developers – Deep knowledge of AI, infra, and execution
section4.list2: Entrepreneurs – We know how to build and scale startups fast
section4.list3: Former Multinational Talent – Bring discipline, structure, and compliance
section4.list4: Gaming Industry Experts – Know the levers of engagement, risk, and profitability
section4.list5: Cross-industry Specialists – Bring fresh thinking, new UX paradigms, and operational creativity
section4.content2: We’re not guessing—we’re building with intention and expertise.

section5.title: What’s the roadmap ahead?
section5.list1: Expansion to new verticals: Casino, Fantasy, Lottery
section5.list3: Deeper integrations with operator CRMs and wallets
section5.list4: Voice commands and voice-based betting interfaces

section6.title: How does ChatBet monetize?
section6.content: Rev-share model with operators. More engagement → better retention → more wagers. ChatBet grows as our partners grow.
